snippet.title: PUNIHI LOADER 2 - Demo Version Update Announce Trailer [Work in Progress]
snippet.description:
"PUNIHI LOADER 2" is customizable mecha third-person shooter in which the one-headed mysterious cute creature "Punihi" rides and fights in unique mecha.
Customize your mecha by combining over 100 parts. You can also change the clothes of "Punihi". Create your own ultimate mecha.

Steam Store
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1956960/2/

Twitter
https://twitter.com/PunihiGames221

Website
https://punihigames.wixsite.com/221games
